snippet: “He told me that if I ever said anything to her or anyone else about he and I, he would kill me,” an Army captain testified.
abstract: Army captain who has accused Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair of sexual assault takes the witness stand on first day of his court-martial; chronicles a three-year affair that included casual sex but also violent moments where he forced her to perform oral sex and threatened to kill her if she disclosed their relationship; Sinclair is one of highest-ranking officers to face court-marital in decades.
lead_paragraph: “He told me that if I ever said anything to her or anyone else about he and I, he would kill me,” an Army captain testified.

headline.main: As General’s Sex Assault Trial Opens, Accuser Describes Violence and Threats
headline.print_headline: As General’s Sex Assault Trial Opens, Accuser Describes Violence and Threats

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
